mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.email, u.created_at FROM USER u ORDER BY u.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT u.*, t.tier_level, t.total_spent, t.tier_updated_at FROM USER u LEFT JOIN USER_TIER t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TIER SET tier_level = #{tierLevel}, tier_updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
